arts.ttl: Moyes celebrates ‘mental’ Merseyside Derby draw with Liverpool
arts.sum: David Moyes believes a ‘mental’ Merseyside Derby was a ‘fitting’ last derby at Goodison Park as Everton equalised in stoppage time against Liverpool. James Tarkowski thumped in a 98th-minute equaliser to cap an enthralling game between the Merseyside rivals. Everton led inside 11 minutes when Beto fired the hosts ahead. The forward ghosted in behind […] The post Moyes celebrates ‘mental’ Merseyside Derby draw with Liverpool first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: James Tarkowski’s last-gasp equaliser sparks wild scenes at Goodison Park
arts.sum: The defender volleyed home at the death to salvage a point for Everton.
